ðŸ“– Summary: Zev is a command-line tool that helps users remember or discover terminal commands by using natural language. It offers both an interactive mode and a direct query mode, allowing users to find commands by describing what they want to do. The tool also provides a setup option to configure settings such as the OpenAI API key.
